rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan space featuring ample natural light from west-facing windows and cross ventilation. Incorporates Vastu principles with a welcoming entrance aligned to the north.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, compact kitchen with natural light from adjacent living area. Designed for efficient workflow and ventilation.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A private, landscaped courtyard providing natural light, fresh air and a visual focal point. Incorporates Vastu elements with water features and greenery.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated, quiet workspace designed with north-facing windows to maximize natural light and reduce glare. Incorporates ergonomic layout for productivity.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-ventilated gym space with natural light from west-facing windows and openable skylights. Equipped for a variety of fitness equipment.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Multi-functional studio space designed for flexible use. It incorporates a split-level layout to provide separation between living and sleeping areas, with large windows maximizing natural light.

openings.description: Large, south-facing windows in the living area for maximum natural light and ventilation. West-facing windows are also incorporated to balance energy flows per Vastu.
Main entrance door with a secure vestibule leading into the living space. Incorporates traditional Indian design elements.
Dedicated home office windows designed to minimize glare and optimize daylighting from north-facing exposures.
Separation door between studio apartment and living area, ensuring privacy in multi-functional space.
